answers: i am a big fan of bts. my favourite member is park jimin who incidentally shares the same name as my own.

answers: i do consider myself a feminist as well. not being a feminist is being on the wrong side of history.

answers: i feel mostly neutral about the concept of gender. it is not something that i really associate with myself.
